spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:script: Enable('MAC_1588', Or(Eq('RGMII_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', '1'), Eq('RMII_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', '1')));\ Set('MAC_1588', And(Eq('RGMII_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', '0'), Eq('RMII_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', '0')), '0');\ Enable('MANAGMENT', Neq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_TBI'));\ Set('RGMII_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Eq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_RGMII'), '1');\ Set('RGMII_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Neq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_RGMII'), '0');\ Set('RMII_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Eq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_RMII'), '1');\ Set('RMII_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Neq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_RMII'), '0');\ Set('RGMII_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', And(Eq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_RGMII'), Eq('MAC_1588', '1')), '1');\ Set('RGMII_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Or(Neq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_RGMII'), Neq('MAC_1588', '1')), '0');\ Set('RMII_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', And(Eq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_RMII'), Eq('MAC_1588', '1')), '1');\ Set('RMII_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Or(Neq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_RMII'), Neq('MAC_1588', '1')), '0');\ Set('TBI_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Eq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_TBI'), '1');\ Set('TBI_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Neq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_TBI'), '0');\ Set('GMII_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Eq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_GMII'), '1');\ Set('GMII_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Neq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_GMII'), '0');\ Set('MII_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Eq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_MII'), '1');\ Set('MII_FABRIC_INTERFACE_EXPOSED', Neq(ValueOf('PHY_MODE'), 'PHY_MODE_MII'), '0');\ Validate('RMII and MII protocols dont support 1000 Speed', Or(Neq('LINE_SPEED', '1000'), And(Neq('PHY_MODE', 'RMII'), Neq('PHY_MODE', 'MII'))));\
